pkgmetadata.longdescription: # [m](https://jmlopez-rod.github.io/m/)## install```pip install jmlopez-m```## developmentStart by opening the devcontainer in VSCode. Once there open a terminal and run```poetry install```and```pnpm install```to install the dependencies.There are several make targets to run. The most important one is`make ci-checks`. Run that since it is the closest to what the CI will run.
